scripts.build: git ls-files *.html | xargs node_modules/.bin/txtinsert && npx tsc
scripts.debug: [ ! -d out ] && mkdir out; rm -rf out/{*,.*}; for f in $(git ls-files --cached --others --exclude-standard); do [ -f $f ] && echo $f; done | xargs cp --parents -t ./out && find out/ -name '*.html' | xargs node_modules/.bin/txtinsert && cd out && npx tsc
